SHOPPER

Shoper is basically an automated scraping bot designed to search specific online malls and filter to the cheapest price of the product you searched for using a complex algorithm, itâ€™s accuracy is based on how you search so please try to be very specific with your keywords. Note : shoper is not 100% accurate. It is advisable that you search for the name of the product online before using the Shopper Bot. The three online malls that are currently supported by Shopper Bot are , Jumia.com , Konga.com.ng and Amazon.com
